name: Confrontation - GTMK 2020
description:
WARNING SENSITIVE MATERIAL REGARDING SUICIDE

Confrontation is a game about talking someone down from committing suicide. The intent of this game is not to be funny, regardless of the art style and audio. Its intent is to show the tension of confrontations such as these, and to give a sense of loss of control in regards to the situation.

The goal of the game is to get the officer close to the civilian and to talk him down from killing himself. As you get closer he gets more "Anxious" and is more likely to pull the trigger. Choose the response you think will best calm down the civilian as you slowly make your way to him.

Controls:

  • W - Dialogue Choice Up
  • S - Dialogue Choice Down
  • Enter - Choose Dialogue Option

You can also click on the dialog options with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
